means: 赞成，同意( approve的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: His mother leaned forward and gave him an approving look.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的母亲探身向前，对他投以赞许的目光。

sentence.Network_en: He gave me an approving nod.
The members were unanimous in approving the project.
sentence.Network_cn: 成员们一致同意批准这个计划.

entry.tran: （反应、话语等）表示赞许的，表示嘉许的
entry.def: An approving reaction or remark shows support for something, or satisfaction with it.

example.ex: His mother leaned forward and gave him an approving look.
example.tran: 他的母亲探身向前，对他投以赞许的目光。

means.word_mean: 1. the formal act of giving approval;

sentences.sentence: "his decision merited the approval of any sensible person"

means.word_mean: 1. expressing or manifesting praise or approval;
